content:
Add Conditional Styles to a FlexCard Element

Conditionally apply styles to a FlexCard element by changing features such as text color, background image, and responsiveness based on the value of a data field. For example, add a red border around a billing FlexCard when the bill status is past due.

Available beginning Summer '21.

To add conditional styles:

* Select an element in your FlexCard
* Click + Add Conditional Style from the Style panel
* Enter a unique name for the visible label for your conditional style
* Click + Add Condition to configure conditions based on data field values
* Click Save

A Default section is added to the top of the Style panel, and when conditions aren't met, default styles apply.

You can edit, toggle between applied/not-applied views, or delete a conditional style by clicking its respective icon.

FlexCards Conditional Style Properties are configurable from the Style panel.
title: Adding Conditional Styles to FlexCards
